_instructions: Edit the values below to customize the plugin behavior
_tmdb_note: Optional: Get free API key from https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api for enhanced movie info
_download_note: Directory where movies will be downloaded and streamed from
_search_limit_note: Maximum number of search results to display (1-20)
_order_by_note: Sort results by: rating, year, title, or date_added
_auto_vpn_note: Automatically connect Mullvad VPN before torrenting (requires mullvad CLI)
_player_note: Media player for streaming: auto, vlc, mpv, mplayer, smplayer, kodi, or system
_trackers_note: List of tracker URLs for torrent connectivity - add more for better performance
